verses.text: And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee.

And the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into me when he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* me upon my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, that I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* him that \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to a \w rebellious|strong="H4775"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* that hath \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against me: they and their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me, \add even\add* unto this \w very|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft nation: Heb. nations\f*

For \add they are\add* \w impudent|strong="H7186"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* and \w stiffhearted|strong="H2389"\w*. I do \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee unto them; and thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft impudent: Heb. hard of face\f*

And they, whether they will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, or whether they will \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*, (for they \add are\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,) yet shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that there hath been a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

¶ And thou, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of them, neither be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of their \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, though \w briers|strong="H5621"\w* and \w thorns|strong="H5544"\w* \add be\add* with thee, and thou dost \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* among \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*: be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of their \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* at their \w looks|strong="H6440"\w*, though they \add be\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft briers…: or, rebels\f*

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto them, whether they will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, or whether they will \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*: for they \add are\add* most \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft most…: Heb. rebellion\f*

But thou, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what I \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee; Be \w not|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* like that \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w open|strong="H6475"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* that I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

¶ And when I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, behold, an \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add was\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto me; and, lo, a \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* of a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \add was\add* therein;

And he \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me; and it \add was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w within|strong="H6440"\w* and \w without|strong="H0268"\w*: and \add there was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* therein \w lamentations|strong="H7015"\w*, and \w mourning|strong="H1899"\w*, and \w woe|strong="H1958"\w*.
